title: AVIRIS-NG Plume Images
description: Methane emissions detected by AVIRIS-NG (Next Generation Airborne Visible-Infrared Imaging Spectrometer); see https://aviris-ng.jpl.nasa.gov/ for more information. Each methane plume is associated with a methane source that is responsible for of the emissions.
spatialResolution: 3m (Varies; for data shown here the average is ~3m)
